caption.p: ( aâ€“ e) The male patient aged 44 years old was confirmed with SARS. On day 82 of onset (April 16, 2003), chest CT plain scan revealed cord-like shadows and ground-glass-density shadows at the left lung superior segment ligule and right lung inferior lobe anterobasal segment. Right lung middle and inferior lobe was detected with lobular septum thickening and subpleural curvature shadows
